body.p: The Review mode provides an intuitive interface that enables you to view documents and document changes. To switch to this mode, tap or click the Review button in the upper toolbar. If you swipe right, or use the button, a side panel is displayed at the left side of the editor area. This panel provides you with access to several views.

The Review mode includes the following views that can be accessed by using the buttons at the top of the side panel:
Review view - Displays the tracked changes and comments made to the document by the content authors.
Attributes view - Displays all possible attributes and their value.
Search view - Allows you to search for text in the current document.
The lower toolbar includes arrow buttons () to skip to the previous or next comment or tracked change, and a button to Add comment.
